scripts.db.dev: gcloud beta emulators datastore start --data-dir __data --host-port localhost:8079 --project wgoodall01-emblem
scripts.server.dev: $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init --data-dir __data --project wgoodall01-emblem) && NODE_ENV=development PORT=8080 nodemon --inspect server.js
scripts.repl: $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init --data-dir __data --project wgoodall01-emblem) && NODE_ENV=development node
